summary: A psychological thriller based on the novel by Agatha Christie. Ten strangers are forced to come face to face with their dark pasts after receiving invitation to an isolated island off the coast of England.
cast: Vladimir Zeldin|Tatyana Drubich|Aleksandr Kaydanovskiy|Aleksey Zharkov|Anatoliy Romashin|Lyudmila Maksakova|Mikhail Gluzskiy|Aleksey Zolotnitskiy|Irina Tereshchenko|Aleksandr Abdulov|V. Arzhatkin|D. Arshinov|V. Ventsler|Vyacheslav Zharikov|Fyodor Odinokov
title: Desyat negrityat
